data.title: DWR awards $150 million to support communities that rely on groundwater
data.excerpt: In an effort to boost water supply reliability for millions of Californians, the California Department of Water Resources (DWR) today announced its first round of funding to 20 agencies responsible for managing critically overdrafted groundwater basins throughout the state.
data.author: Shawn Brouwer
